item.title: Additional 10% off on books with this Landmark coupon
item.description: Valid on cart value of Rs 500 and above.

item.title: Dominos coupon: 20% off on your order
item.description: Valid on orders or Rs 350 and above. Not valid on regular size, simple veg/non-veg pizza & combos.

item.title: JustEat coupon: 30% off all orders
item.description: Maximum discount Rs 150. The coupon is applicable only on restaurants that accept online payment.

item.title: uRead coupon for 5% off on all books
item.description: No minimum purchase required. The exact expiry date is unknown.

item.title: iBhejo coupon: Rs 5,000 off on HTC One 32GB
Paytm cashback code: Get 25% cashback on your first mobile app order
item.description: Only valid for the first recharge on Android, iOSM Blackberry or Windows mobile applications. Not applicable for users who have recharged from any of Paytm's mobile apps in the past. One-time use only. Cash back will be 25% of the order, or Rs 100, whichever is lower. Users will receieve an e-mail within 7 working days with the cashback amount, and other instructions. Cash back will be credited to your Paytm cash account, and will not be refunded to your bank. We do not know when this offer will end, so be sure to check when ordering that the coupon is still valid.

item.title: Ebay coupon: Rs 500 off on imported watches
FirstCry coupon: Rs 300 off on baby & kids shopping
